::Amperion::
    He had headed away from the clearing where he left Amp in a dead puddle 
of mech fluid.  He came to another clearing only this one had a ship in it.  
He had stumbled upon the CF. He walked up to the hatch.  "Hello!  I have come 
to find the young ones."
